text: Blaze and the Monster Machines is a children's TV series on Nickelodeon. == Plot == The show features a fast reddish-orange monster machine, all of his friends, and rivals living in Axle City with the Monster Dome on the other side of it. ==Characters== ===Main=== * Blaze * AJ * Gabby * Starla * Zeg * Stripes * Darington * Crusher * Pickle * Watts * Sparkle ===Recurring=== ===Minor=== ===Special guest stars=== Category:Nickelodeon television series Category:English-language television programs Category:2014 American television series debuts Category:2014 Canadian television series debuts Category:2010s Canadian television series debuts Category:2010s animated television series
title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
